name: Snow-bo With a Shotgun
description:
[WORD OF WARNING]
This game kinda hurts your eyes after a while. I'm sorry.

The ski resort is under attack by living snowmen!

You've got to fight your way through the horde to reach the safety of the cottage. But be warned, there's a blizzard on the way. And it might get tough to tell friend from foe.

Controls: Right and Left arrow keys or A and D to move side-to-side.
Space Bar to shoot your shotgun

Title screen music is "Night on Bald Mountain" by  Mussorgsky
In-Game music is "Prelude and Fugue in C minor" by Bach
Death screen music is "Dies Irae" by Mozart

I had the idea for this when I was thinking about how having everything be one color might make it hard to tell things apart. So I made it snow harder and harder as you played to obscure more and more of the view. I apologize that this game can be kinda hard on the eyes.
